summary: This document is an email exchange between FBI personnel regarding the preparation and service of a subpoena to CapitalOne bank for financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein. It includes instructions for the subpoena's content and delivery.

persons.name: Ori
persons.context: Appears to be the sender of the email providing an account number and attached rider for a subpoena to CapitalOne regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subpoena is being prepared for CapitalOne bank regarding his financial records.

connections.description: Ori, as an FBI Forensic Accountant, is involved in obtaining financial records via subpoena related to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Subpoena preparation for CapitalOne
events.description: FBI personnel correspond to prepare and serve a subpoena to CapitalOne bank for financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively subpoenaing financial records from CapitalOne bank related to Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019.
An FBI Forensic Accountant named Ori located an account number and provided a rider for the subpoena.
The subpoena results were to be sent electronically to an FBI Special Agent at 26 Federal Plaza in New York.
This document shows ongoing financial investigation into Epstein following his arrest and death.
